Présent (Present).J'agis: I act, behave; work, take effect
Présent (Present).Tu agis: You act, behave; work, take effect
Présent (Present).Il/Elle agit: He/She acts, behaves; works, takes effect
Présent (Present).Nous agissons: We act, behave; work, take effect
Présent (Present).Vous agissez: You act, behave; work, take effect (formal)
Présent (Present).Ils/Elles agissent: They act, behave; work, take effect

Imparfait (Imperfect).J'agissais: I used to act, behave; work, take effect
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu agissais: You used to act, behave; work, take effect
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle agissait: He/She used to act, behave; work, take effect
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous agissions: We used to act, behave; work, take effect
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous agissiez: You used to act, behave; work, take effect (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles agissaient: They used to act, behave; work, take effect

Passé composé (Present Perfect).J'ai agi: I have acted, behaved; worked, taken effect
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Tu as agi: You have acted, behaved; worked, taken effect
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Il/Elle a agi: He/She has acted, behaved; worked, taken effect
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Nous avons agi: We have acted, behaved; worked, taken effect
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Vous avez agi: You have acted, behaved; worked, taken effect (formal)
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Ils/Elles ont agi: They have acted, behaved; worked, taken effect

Futur (Future).J'agirai: I will act, behave; work, take effect
Futur (Future).Tu agiras: You will act, behave; work, take effect
Futur (Future).Il/Elle agira: He/She will act, behave; work, take effect
Futur (Future).Nous agirons: We will act, behave; work, take effect
Futur (Future).Vous agirez: You will act, behave; work, take effect (formal)
Futur (Future).Ils/Elles agiront: They will act, behave; work, take effect

Conditionnel (Conditional).J'agirais: I would act, behave; work, take effect
Conditionnel (Conditional).Tu agirais: You would act, behave; work, take effect
Conditionnel (Conditional).Il/Elle agirait: He/She would act, behave; work, take effect
Conditionnel (Conditional).Nous agirions: We would act, behave; work, take effect
Conditionnel (Conditional).Vous agiriez: You would act, behave; work, take effect (formal)
Conditionnel (Conditional).Ils/Elles agiraient: They would act, behave; work, take effect

Subjonctif (Subjunctive).Que j'agisse: That I act, behave; work, take effect
Subjonctif (Subjunctive).Que tu agisses: That you act, behave; work, take effect
Subjonctif (Subjunctive).Qu'il/elle agisse: That he/she acts, behaves; works, takes effect
Subjonctif (Subjunctive).Que nous agissions: That we act, behave; work, take effect
Subjonctif (Subjunctive).Que vous agissiez: That you act, behave; work, take effect (formal)
Subjonctif (Subjunctive).Qu'ils/elles agissent: That they act, behave; work, take effect

Impératif (Imperative).Agissons: Let's act, behave; work, take effect (nous)
